CS GO IS DEAD!!
After over 1000 hours in this game i realy can just say don't play this. Even tho it started as a great game you can see that valve dosn't give a fuck about this game anymore. 
1. Nearly no updates at all 
2. 8 Years and still no decent anticheat system
3. Game got free to play so now cheating is even more ez since you dont have to worry about losing your 
    10$ worth of the game just create a new acc and you are good to go 
4. Skin Price and drop chances aswell as key costs are just ridiculous
5. Not listening to the comunnity at all 
6. Decreasing Playerbase 

There are way better similar games out there atm where developer are acctualy working on improving the game. Valorant for example
Spiel ist nice, es gibt zwar sehr viele Schummler, aber wenn man Geduld hat, sollte das Problem beseitigt sein :)
Good game! I am recommend this game!
